snippet: New York City public school students are undergoing rigorous preparation for the redesigned exams, which are likely to cover some material that is not yet in the curriculum.
abstract: Students across New York State are preparing to take redesigned standardized tests that are aligned with national Common Core standards meant to improve critical thinking; New York is one of only a few states that have developed tests to match the standards, which represent more rigorous classroom goals for American students.
lead_paragraph: New York City public school students are undergoing rigorous preparation for the redesigned exams, which are likely to cover some material that is not yet in the curriculum.

headline.seo: With Tougher Standardized Tests, a Reminder to Breathe
headline.main: Students Face Tougher Tests That Outpace Lesson Plans
headline.print_headline: Students Face Tougher Tests That Outpace Lesson Plans
